dialogue.text: Honey? What are you doing?? Get back here!!
I cannot believe you just up and left like that!
Is Space Journey really that worth it??
Was it me? Did I do something wrong?
Where did we go so wrong? Why won't you come back?
Things have been so good together, and then you go and do this?
WHY
Wait..
Hold up...
You're flying through hyperspace far too fast, you're going to get hurt.
I'm looking at your flight plan, dear you're going to get youself killed!!
Please... Come back...
Fine Then!
If you won't stop this ridiculous escapade, I will!
Hello? BlackBark's Pirate Adventure n' Bounty Hunting Co.?
This is them! Woof!
My spouse is going to get themselves killed in hyperspace! Please save them!!!
Woof! We'll go fetch!!!
How quickly Customer?
As fast as possible!!
Can do! Woof!
(Time passes)
You see how dangerous it is out there!

That was the pirates wasn't it. 
 A. Yes B. 
 No C. Bark D. [Silent Treatment]
dialogue.correctAnswerResponse: Of course it was, uhhh whooops.

dialogue.text: Do you remember when we first met?
It was such a beautiful day...
I remember it like it was yesterday
The picnic was wonderful.
Please come back
You've been gone for all of... A few hours?
%Date%, Oh. Such a wonderful day... at the time, one of the best days of my life...
But I'm so worried about how you are doing.
We've done so much together.
Do you even care?
That's why you've gone isn't it?
You've left because you don't care!!
You absolute monster!
That day you gave me those %Color% flowers... those colors were magnificent
Maybe you aren't a monster.
Event%, isn't that what day it is where you are?

When did we first meet? 
 A. %RandDate% B. %Date% 
 C. %RandDate% D. %RandDate%

If you claim to know me so well, what is my favorite color? 
 A. %RandColor% B. %RandColor% 
 C. %Color% D. %RandColor%

When was our wedding day, surely you care enough to remember that? 
 A. %Date% B. %RandomDate% 
 C. %RandomDate% D. %RandomDate%
dialogue.correctAnswerResponse: Right, of course you would remember, sorry.

dialogue.text:
Do you even remember what today is!? 
 A. %Event% B. %Event%. 
 C. %Event% D. None of the above
dialogue.correctAnswerResponse: Wait... Oh that's right it's nothing.
